TopicTitle: How many unspent science points do you have (after unlocking the entire tech tree)?

Articles.Content: I've got 9926 points and rising. I'm hoping the tech tree is expanded (to include bigger solid rocket boosters) so I can spend them.

Currently I have close to 4500. If I wanted I could have had a multitude of that. 

I've got the Patents Licensing strategy set to 100%. All the science I get is converted into Funds. As a result I have close to 20 million to spare on interplanetary motherships.

> 
> I've got 9926 points and rising. I'm hoping the tech tree is expanded (to include bigger solid rocket boosters) so I can spend them.

I'm pretty sure I saw somewhere recently that a new 1000 point tier is being added at the very least, in addition to a lot of other tree changes.

Only 111, because I went 60% to Funds and 40% to Reputation when I finished tech. Never bothered taking Administration to Level 3, as Mortimer pointed out how much damn science would be required to justify the millions of funds in capital investment.
25K, and that's almost all Kerbin SOI except a couple crew reports en route to Duna.

> 
> 25K, and that's almost all Kerbin SOI except a couple crew reports en route to Duna.

I didn't imagine that could be possible!
45045.5 in my 0.25 career save. The next best is my first 0.90 career save with 25,986.5.

61000

I just returned with 41000 points from my Joolian mission. And another 18000 from my Eeloo survey (touchdown on every biome in only one mission).

PS : I play in Science gamemode, not Career

Contracts. Lot of contracts...

That and not being much in a hurry to go inter-planetary. So I farmed out the mun with an orbit lab and a refueled lander, then did close to the same to minmus. I probably farmed out kerbin too with a tier1 plane.
